Rock_Hill.Winthrop Coliseum: Winthrop Coliseum is a 6,100-seat multi-purpose arena in Rock Hill, South Carolina. It was built in 1982 and is home to the Winthrop University Eagles basketball team. It hosted the Big South Conference men's basketball tournament three times (1988–90) and the conference title game in 2005, 2006, and 2007.
